MainTitle: Institutions Officially Declare InterLink Token as a Treasury Asset
Content:
Institutions Officially Declare InterLink Token as a Treasury Asset

A group of global institutions has officially declared the InterLink token as part of their long-term treasury and reserve strategies, marking a significant milestone in the maturation of the Human Network economy.

Participating Institutions

New To The Street (USA)

AI Supercluster Pte Ltd (Singapore)

Superior AI Labs Limited (Hong Kong)

Immersion Consulting Pte Ltd (Singapore)

Idom Capital Inc (USA)

HPX LLC (Dubai)

Qihong Entertainment (Hong Kong)

Treasury Vision

The InterLink Treasury is built to protect long-term token value by prioritizing disciplined institutional participation over speculative inflows.

User Impact

A more stable economy, stronger long-term value support, and expanding real-world use cases for the InterLink token.

Visit Our Treasury Partners

InterLink collaborates with trusted global institutions that strengthen transparency, infrastructure, governance, and real-world utility.
